name: 祈風 Inorikaze
description: Inorikaze is a Touhou doujin game focus with the theme of pursuing the faith and bond. The main story is about Moriya family when they left Suwa and moved into Gensokyo, the Fantasy Village, and overcome the war between them and Tengus.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Pentium3 1.0GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/vista/8/10 Processor: Pentium3 1.0GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
